item.title: Goodwin: A superlative British manufacturer to buy now
item.description: Veteran engineering group Goodwin has created a new profit engine. But following its tremendous run, can investors still afford the shares?

item.title: A change in leadership: Is US stock market exceptionalism over?
item.description: US stocks trailed the rest of the world in 2025. Is this a sign that a long-overdue shift is underway?

item.title: A reckoning is coming for unnecessary investment trusts
item.description: Investment trusts that don’t use their structural advantages will find it increasingly hard to survive, says Rupert Hargreaves

item.title: Modern Monetary Theory and the return of magical thinking
item.description: The Modern Monetary Theory is back in fashion again. How worried should we be?

item.title: Metals and AI power emerging markets
